title: rAma nAmave
sahitya:
rAma nAmava nuDi nuDi kAma krOdhagaLa biDi biDi shrI rAma nAmava nuDi nuDi


caraNam 1    gurugaLa caraNava hiDi hiDi hari nirmAlyava muDi muDi karakare 
bhava pAshava kaDi kaDi banda duritavanella hoDi hoDi
    caraNam 2    sajjanara sangava mADO mADO durjanara sangava biDO biDO 
arjuna sArathi rUp nODO nODO hari bhajaneyali mana iDO iDO
    caraNam 3    karirAja varadana sArO sArO shrama pariharisendu hOrO hOrO 
varada bhImasEna duradirO namma purandara viTTalana sErO sErO
